roleset.name: divvy up
roleset.note: PROPORTION-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from proportion.01-v)

example.name: proportion-v: transitive, all args
example.text: John divided the dough into small balls the size of a fist.
example.arg: into small bals the size of a fist

roleset.name: corresponding, having a constant ratio
roleset.note: PROPORTIONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: proportional-j
example.text: This is so because the energy released in an earthquake , and thus its magnitude , is proportional to the area of the fault that ruptures [ 5 ] and the stress drop .
example.arg: the energy released in an earthquake , and thus its magnitude ,
to the area of the fault that ruptures [ 5 ] and the stress drop
